data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Welfare is an idea from economics and Social Security. The ____ is ____ everyone ____ have a minimal ____ standard. People ____ can ____ reach ____ standard ____ be ____, ____ by ____ state. Using ____, ____ has ____ basic ____ covered. This idea is different from the idea of charity.
data.partBlankContent: Welfare is an idea from economics and Social Security. The id__ is th__ everyone sho___ have a minimal liv___ standard. People w__ can n__ reach th__ standard wi__ be supp_____, usu____ by t__ state. Using wel____, ever____ has th___ basic ne___ covered. This idea is different from the idea of charity.
data.answer: 福利是经济学和社会保障学的概念。这个想法是每个人都应该有一个最低的生活标准。达不到这个标准的人通常会得到国家的支持。通过福利，每个人的基本需求都得到了满足。这个想法不同于慈善的想法。
